title: AI-Based Science Teacher Education: Personalized Feedback and Text Analysis for Problem-Based Learning (PBL) and Language Interaction Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theories, PBL (Project-Based Learning) methodologies, understanding of science text analysis (vocabulary/grammar/context comprehension), and communication strategies (discussion facilitation, feedback techniques)
context.additional_context: Science lesson design competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers using AI-generated video content. Focuses on improving linguistic expression of scientific concepts (accuracy/clarity), facilitating learner discussions (questioning techniques/response strategies), and feedback clarity (grammatical correctness/contextual appropriateness).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze linguistic expressions of scientific concepts (text structure, vocabulary usage) using AI-generated video preview features in PBL environments and produce project reports meeting ≥3.5 on a 5-point Likert-scale comprehension survey and ≥3 out of 4 rubric criteria (grammar accuracy, lexical diversity, logical organization, communicative effectiveness)
Apply AI-based personalized feedback to improve PBL lesson design capabilities and learner communication strategies (questioning facilitation, feedback clarity, discussion promotion) by ≥80%

Generate and evaluate ≥3 learner engagement strategies (open-ended questioning, reflective thinking facilitation, collaborative learning structuring) in science simulations, reviewing them from linguistic interaction perspectives (perspective expression, logical rebuttal, empathetic response)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
